name: bankAction
info:
Example `msg`:
```yaml
payload:
    userId: ABCD
    action: addCoins
    value: 10
```

name: Random list
Odds
template:
---
blue: 30
red: 20
green: 15
bowserJr: 5
bowser: 5
badLuck: 1

name: Shuffle list
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.sort(() => Math.random() - 0.5)
return msg;

name: Keep last 20
func:
const keep = 20
msg.payload = msg.payload.slice(-1 * keep)
return msg

name: Lookup
Get current right answer
next ‚è©
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload + 1
return msg;

name: ‚è™ prev
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload - 1
return msg;
